model.name: turbo
model.description: Whisper model to use for transcription (tiny=fastest, turbo=most accurate and fast, but needs more memory)

output.description: type=character by character, paste=immediate paste, clipboard=copy only

type.description: Delay in ms between single key pressed in the type output mode. Increase this value if you miss letters.

logging.description: Enable or disable logging of transcriptions to file

shortcut.description: Keyboard shortcut combination to start/stop recording

delete_wav.description: Set to false to listen to the WAV recordings
